channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Uber and WeRide’s robotaxi service in Abu Dhabi is officially driverless
item.description: The commercial robotaxi service launched last year. Now, the human safety operator is gone.

item.title: ICE Offers Up to $280 Million to Immigrant-Tracking ‘Bounty Hunter’ Firms
item.description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement lifted a $180 million cap on a proposed immigrant-tracking program while guaranteeing multimillion-dollar payouts ...

item.title: YouTube is working on a feature that will fix the messy home feed
item.description: YouTube is experimenting with a new feature that allows users to customize their home feed.

item.title: Character AI will offer interactive ‘Stories’ to kids instead of open-ended chat
item.description: The company announced last month that it would no longer allow minors to use its chat features.

item.title: Warner Music signs deal with AI music startup Suno, settles lawsuit
item.description: WMG says artists and songwriters will have full control over whether and how their names, images, likenesses, voices, and compositions are used in new...

item.title: The 50 Best Shows on HBO Max, WIRED’s Picks (December 2025)
item.description: I Love LA, The Seduction, and It: Welcome to Derry are just a few of the shows you need to be watching on HBO Max this month.

item.title: ChatGPT’s voice mode is no longer a separate interface
item.description: ChatGPT now lets you use voice and text in the same screen, making conversations feel more natural as responses and visuals appear in real time.

item.title: The Best Deals from Huckberry’s 2025 Black Friday Sale
item.description: Huckberry’s Black Friday sale features deals on an eclectic curation of travel clothing, coffee gear, and lock-pick training kits (seriously).

item.title: Why ‘hold forever’ investors are snapping up venture capital ‘zombies’
item.description: An investor explains the "buy, fix, and hold" model employed by Bending Spoons and similar companies that buy distressed startups.

item.title: ChatGPT’s voice mode is no longer a separate interface
item.description: ChatGPT now lets you use voice and text in the same screen, making conversations feel more natural as responses and visuals appear in real time.
